UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Modulation of antimicrobial potency of human cathelicidin peptides against the ESKAPE pathogens and in vivo efficacy in a murine catheter-associated biofilm model.
Literature.Author: Narayana JL, Mishra B, Lushnikova T, Golla RM, Wang G

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:61.5% Hemolysis=220 µM,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=180 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cytotoxicity=>25 µM,Human keratinocytes HaCat:50% Cytotoxicity=>25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Enterococcus faecium ATCC 51559(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=3.1µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=3.1µM),Acinetobacter baumannii B28-16(MIC=3.1µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=6.25µM),Enterobacter cloacae B2366-12(MIC=6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus Newman(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus MU50(MIC=3.1-6.25µM),Staphylococcus aureus SA546(MIC=3.1µM),Staphylococcus aureus UAMS-1(MIC=3.1µM),Human acute monocytic leukemia THP-1(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>12.5µM)
